dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds

Class CDSGenScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.CDSGenScope

  • public class CDSGenScope
extends java.lang.Object
    Writing types and vars to a CDSGenFile always requires an active CDSGenScope. If you didn't specify a scope explicitly then a default scope is created. A scope affects the generation of CDS data by its CDSGenScope.Attributes.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Method Detail

      • hasAttribute

        public boolean hasAttribute(java.lang.Class<? extends CDSGenScope.Attribute> attribClass)
        Determines whether this scope has an attribute associated with the given attibute class.
        Parameters:
        attribClass - The attribute class to check.
        Returns:
        true if this scope has an attribute associated with the given attibute class.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getAttribute

        public <T extends CDSGenScope.Attribute> T getAttribute(java.lang.Class<T> attribClass)
        Returns the scope attribute associated with the given attribute class. Can be null if the requested attribute is not within this scope.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Resulting instance of the given attribute class.
        Parameters:
        attribClass - The class of the requested scope attribute.
        Returns:
        The scope attribute associated with the given class or null.
        Since:
        2008.b
